bible.notes: Greek text of Hermann von Soden

translations.name: Moffatt, New Translation
translations.description: Moffatt, New Translation (MNT) is an abbreviation of the title \\\"The Holy Bible Containing the Old and New Testaments, a New Translation\\\" by James Moffatt. In the introduction to his 1926 edition, Moffatt wrote, \\\"The aim I have endeavored to keep before my mind in making this translation has been to present the books of the Old and the New Testament in effective, intelligible English.”
